pr_title: [JENKINS-64393] update jupiter to fix not running junit4 tests

timeline.message:
[JENKINS-64393] update jupiter to fix not running junit4 tests

the version of jupiter was incompatable with the version of junit4
causing all junit4 tests to not run (and not fail).

timeline.bodyText: Can we move the version into the parent POM so it is managed in just one place?
timeline.author: jglick
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -16,7 +16,7 @@
   <properties>
     <!-- TODO: remove once Medium level is set in the core (JENKINS-36716) -->
     <findbugs.threshold>Medium</findbugs.threshold>
-    <junit.jupiter.version>5.5.2</junit.jupiter.version>
+    <junit.jupiter.version>5.7.0</junit.jupiter.version>
